column4: Is anyone using an iPod Brand Ipod dock sucsesssfully in Edgy, mine will not register the ipod when I place it in the dock
Ipod dock users out there?
yes
you just have to use keypad to remap them
I have an iPod with the usb cable. It showed up on the desktop but I never got it to sync music. I installed rocbox and it works
rockbox
I have no problems with the orig firmware, and I use rockbox too, but I bout a dock and through the dock it does not recognize the ipod anymore
I don't think roxkbox will work with the dock
the orig firmware should though. Might be a Linux thing
i am trying to get it to recognize it through the org firmware from apple
Is the dock USB?
yeah, usb
im taking it back
I am sick of I pod, gonna build my own player from NEXT
You could check /proc/bus/usb/devices to see if it's connected
what's NEXT?
its a website that has kits that you can buy and assemble your own stuff
What's the web address
no change in the usb section of /proc
Im not sure of the addy for next
Well, it's not getting picked up by the syste
Take it back
